function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of control over room temperature and humidity","Impact":"Increased risk of virus transmission due to inefficient control of environmental conditions","Mitigation":"Implementation of separate room-by-room temperature and humidity control","Technologies":"Automatic HVAC control, separate control valves, and humidity control systems","People":"Building occupants","Owner":"Building management"},{"Description":"Inadequate mental health support in built environments","Impact":"Negative impact on mental health, particularly during and after a pandemic","Mitigation":"Provision of greenery, gardens, and plants in indoor and outdoor spaces","Technologies":"Landscape design, indoor potted plants, water features","People":"Building occupants","Owner":"Building management"}]}
